description: Add Amazon EC2 support for ClassicLink actions and add a delete action to EC2 ``Volume`` resources.
Add a ``load`` operation and ``user`` reference to AWS IAM's ``CurrentUser`` resource. (`issue 72 <https://github.com/boto/boto3/pull/72>`__,
Add resources for AWS IAM managed policies. (`issue 71 <https://github.com/boto/boto3/pull/71>`__)
